## IamAssumeTokenManager.saveTokenInfo() method

Extend this method from the parent class to erase the refresh token from the class - we do not want to expose it for IAM Assume authentication.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected saveTokenInfo(tokenResponse: any): void;
```
